definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pull out or up, set out, journey (NH id., move, march; As. nisû, set out, withdraw, etc. Dl:HWB 470; Nö:ZMG x1(1886), 723 cp. also Ar. naza9a, Eth. naz9a: [rare] pull up, away, so Ba:ES 51);—
pull out or up, city-gate and gate-posts Ju Jdg 16:3; loom v:Jdg 16:14 (on text cf. GFM), tent-pegs Is 33:20 (fig. of Jerusalem; cf. also

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: set out Ge 35:5, Nu 12:15 (both E), Je 4:7 (‖[[יׇחָא מִמְּקוֹמוֹ]]); even of lifeless things, e.g. the ark, [[הָאָרוֹן]] Nu 10:35 (JE); oft. in P: Ex 14:15, Ex 40:37, Nu 1:51, Nu 4:5, Nu 4:15, Nu 9:17 + 8 t. Nu 9, Nu 10:5, Nu 10:6, Nu 10:17, Nu 10:18, Nu 10:21, Nu 10:22, Nu 10:25, so prob. also Nu 2:8 + 6 t. Nu 2 (v. infr.; even of lifeless things, [[דֶּגֶל]] Nu 10:18, Nu 10:12, [[מִשְׁכָּן]] Nu 1:51, [[אׂהֶל מוֹעֵד]] Nu 2:17), Nu 33:3; [[וַיׇּבׂא]]…[[וַיִּסַּע]] Ge 46:1 (E) and Isr. set out, and came, etc., Ex 16:1, Ex 19:2, Nu 20:22, Jos 9:17 (all P), De 1:7, [[נִסְעָה וְנֵלֵָכָה]] De 33:12 (J); ([[וַיַּעֲלוּ]]…) [[וַיִּסְעוּ]] Ju Jdg 18:11, [[סְעוּ וְעִבְרוּ]] De 2:24; ´[[נ]] oft. c. [[מִן]] Ge 35:16 (E), Nu 10:34 (JE), [[מֵאָהֳלֵיהֶם לַעֲבׂר]] ´[[נ]] Jos 3:14 (JE), set out from their tents, to cross, etc.; cf. ´[[נ]] [[לָלֶכֶת]]…[[מִן]] Ezr 8:31; c. [[מִן]] + [[ויבא]], Jos 3:1 (JE), Nu 33:9 (P), + [[וַיֵּלֶח]] v:Nu 33:3 (D), De 1:19, + [[וַיַּעַבְרוּ]] Nu 33:8 (P); + [[וַיׇּשָׁב]] + [[וַיַּêֲחנוּ]] Nu 33:7 (P).
journey, march (by stages) Ge 12:9, Ge 35:21 (both J), Nu 10:13, Nu 10:14, Nu 10:28 (P), (poss. also Nu 2:9 etc., cf.

supr.); + [[לְמַסְעֵיהֶם]] acc. to their stations, i.e. by stages Ex 17:1, Nu 10:12 (+ [[מִן]]), cf. Ex 40:36 (all P); sq. [[ה]] loc. Ge 12:9, Ge 33:17 (both J), De 1:40 De 2:1; [[סְעוּ לָכֶם]] [[הַמִּדְבָּר]] Nu 14:25 (JE); sq. [[מִקֶּדֶם]] eastward (v. [[מִן]]

definitions.title: 1. c
definitions.body: ) Ge 11:2, Ge 13:11 (both J), [[אַחֲרֵי]] Ex 14:10 (J), [[אֶל־]] Nu 10:29, [[לִפְנֵי]] v:Nu 10:33 (of ark; all J); sq. [[מִן]] + [[ה]] loc. Ge 20:1 (E), De 10:6, De 10:7, Ex 12:37 (P), + acc. loc. Nu 11:35 (JE); sq. [[מִן]] + acc. of distance, [[דֶּרֶח]] Nu 10:33 (JE), Nu 21:4 (P); esp. [[וַיַּחֲנוּ]]…[[וַיִּסְעוּ מִן]] Nu 21:12, Nu 21:13 (JE), Ex 13:20, Nu 21:11, Nu 33:5 + 37 t. Nu 33 (all P); of shepherds Je 31:24.—[[נׇֽסְעוּ כְמוֹ חאׁן]] Zec 10:2 is dub.; We [[נׇעוּ]] or [[יׇנֻעוּ]], so Now.
of wind, ´[[רוּחַ מֵאֵת י]] ´[[נ]] Nu 11:31 there set forth (sprang up) a wind from ´[[י]]. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. be pulled up, removed: 3 ms. [[דּוֹרִי נִסַּע וְנִגְלָה מִנִּי כְּאׂהֶל רׂעִי]] Is 38:12; of tent-peg [[הֲלאׁ נִסַּע]] Job 4:21 (reading [[יְתֵדָם]] for [[יִתְרָם]], v. II. [[יֶתֶר]]). †

cause to set out, lead out, c. acc. pers. Ex 15:22 (J; + [[מִן]], [[וַיֵּחְאוּ]]), Ps 78:52 ([[כַּצּאׁן]]; ‖[[וַיְנַהֲגֵם]]), Ps 80:9 ([[מִן]]; fig. of vine); fig. of a wind, cause to spring up, [[יַסַּע קָדִים]] Ps 78:26 (‖[[וַיְנַהֵג]]; cf.
remove, c. acc. rei 2Ki 4:4; [[וַיַּסַּע כָּעֵץ תִּקְוׇתִי]] Job 19:10; specif., remove from quarry, quarry: 1Ki 5:31 and they quarried great stones, cf. Ec 10:9.
